item.description:
Members of the SSDOMG and their guests are invited to Angela's Annual Holiday Party!

Saturday, December 29th, 2007
8pm-Midnite
Zahn's Bahn @ Kilroy's
132 E. Howard Street
(Across from the Shipyard near Route 53)
Quincy, MA 02169

Featuring: Country Karaoke by Lynne
(There is non-country music available as well.)

Come on out and have some fun! In addition to Karaoke, Lynne will be playing some popular country songs that we can line dance to as well as everyone's favorite hit songs that we can dance to and enjoy.

Please RSVP by December 26th.
The more the merrier! Guests are welcome!
No event fee.
Directions to follow.

I look forward to seeing you at my Annual Holiday Party on Saturday, December 29th!
Angela


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Located off Route 53 directly across from the former Shipyard.


From Route 3:
Take Exit 17/Union Street, Braintree.
Exit the Rotary on the side w/ the Sunoco Gas Station and Braintree Police Station.
Go straight through the first light @ the intersection of Middle Street.
Continue straight thru the next major intersection (which will eventually have a light) of Liberty and Commercial Street. Union Street technically ends here and now you are on Commercial Street.
Follow straight to the next set of lights, which is Weymouth Landing.
Take a Left onto Route 53 Northbound.
Go straight thru your first set of lights @ the Commuter Rail Station.
Go straight thru your next 3 sets of lights passing the Gas Station and Dunkin Donuts on your Right.
As you cross over the railroad tracks (that go thru the Shipyard which is on your Right) you will be entering Quincy.
At the next set of lights take a Right onto E. Howard Street.
Follow Â¼ mile, passing Coffee Express on your Left.
Parking lot and entrance is directly across the street from the Shipyard.


From Route 93:
Take Exit 7 towards Route 3/Cape Cod.
Follow directions ?From Route 3.?


From Route 24:
Merge onto Route 93 NB.
Follow directions ?From Route 93.?


From Route 128/95:
Follow to Route 93 NB.
Follow directions ?From Route 93.?


Parking available in the parking lot and on-street.

Entrance is off the parking lot.

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Angela's Annual Holiday Party
